channel.title: CVE Feed for codepeople -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for codepeople -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28494|2024-06-04T17:28:52.437Z -- codepeople -- contact%20form%20email
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople Contact Form Email allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Contact Form Email: from n/a through 1.3.31.

item.title: CVE-2023-28492|2024-06-04T17:28:49.008Z -- codepeople -- cp%20multi%20view%20event%20calendar
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople CP Multi View Event Calendar allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects CP Multi View Event Calendar: from n/a through 1.4.10.

item.title: CVE-2023-48318|2024-06-07T17:11:58.578Z -- codepeople -- contact%20form%20email
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in CodePeople Contact Form Email allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Contact Form Email: from n/a through 1.3.41.

item.title: CVE-2023-26523|2024-06-04T19:26:17.382Z -- codepeople -- calculated%20fields%20form
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople Calculated Fields Form allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Calculated Fields Form: from n/a through 1.1.120.

item.title: CVE-2023-26521|2024-06-04T17:25:52.341Z -- codepeople -- search%20in%20place
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople Search in Place allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Search in Place: from n/a through 1.0.104.

item.title: CVE-2023-36384|2023-07-18T14:17:40.116Z -- codepeople -- booking%20calendar%20contact%20form
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CodePeople Booking Calendar Contact Form plugin <= 1.2.40 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23971|2023-04-06T05:04:10.875Z -- codepeople -- wp%20time%20slots%20booking%20form
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in CodePeople WP Time Slots Booking Form plugin <= 1.1.81 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-41732|2023-10-06T14:44:42.631Z -- codepeople -- cp%20blocks
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CodePeople CP Blocks plugin <= 1.0.20 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-51517|2023-12-29T14:48:26.252Z -- codepeople -- calculated%20fields%20form
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in CodePeople Calculated Fields Form.This issue affects Calculated Fields Form: from n/a through 1.2.28.

item.title: CVE-2023-25039|2024-03-25T11:46:49.366Z -- codepeople -- google%20maps%20cp
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople Google Maps CP.This issue affects Google Maps CP: from n/a through 1.0.43.

item.title: CVE-2023-6446|2024-01-11T06:49:33.201Z -- codepeople -- calculated%20fields%20form
item.description: The Calculated Fields Form plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via admin settings in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.40 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with administrator-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. This only affects multi-site installations and installations where unfiltered_html has been disabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-0963|2024-02-02T11:34:15.217Z -- codepeople -- calculated%20fields%20form
item.description: The Calculated Fields Form plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's CP_CALCULATED_FIELDS shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.52 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied 'location' attribute. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-29759|2024-06-04T17:57:11.579Z -- codepeople -- calculated%20fields%20form
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodePeople Calculated Fields Form allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Calculated Fields Form: from n/a through 1.2.54.

item.title: CVE-2024-32720|2024-06-04T17:52:18.963Z -- codepeople -- appointment%20hour%20booking
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in CodePeople Appointment Hour Booking allows Removing Important Client Functionality.This issue affects Appointment Hour Booking: from n/a through 1.4.56.

item.title: CVE-2024-36082|2024-06-07T18:28:00.231Z -- codepeople -- music%20store%20-%20wordpress%20ecommerce
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Music Store - WordPress eCommerce versions prior to 1.1.14 allows a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary SQL commands. Information stored in the database may be obtained or altered by the attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-33543|2024-06-10T17:09:33.062Z -- codepeople -- wp%20time%20slots%20booking%20form
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople WP Time Slots Booking Form.This issue affects WP Time Slots Booking Form: from n/a through 1.2.06.

item.title: CVE-2024-24873|2024-05-17T08:24:16.872Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: : Improper Control of Interaction Frequency vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Flooding.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-24874|2024-06-04T17:42:54.038Z -- codepeople -- cp%20polls
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in CodePeople CP Polls allows Code Injection.This issue affects CP Polls: from n/a through 1.0.71.

item.title: CVE-2024-31941|2024-04-15T09:11:49.238Z -- codepeople -- cp%20media%20player
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CodePeople CP Media Player.This issue affects CP Media Player: from n/a through 1.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31302|2024-06-04T17:36:01.402Z -- codepeople -- contact%20form%20email
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in CodePeople Contact Form Email.This issue affects Contact Form Email: from n/a through 1.3.44.

item.title: CVE-2024-35734|2024-06-10T10:58:19.491Z -- codepeople -- wp%20time%20slots%20booking%20form
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodePeople WP Time Slots Booking Form allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Time Slots Booking Form: from n/a through 1.2.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-35735|2024-06-10T15:02:53.964Z -- codepeople -- wp%20time%20slots%20booking%20form
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in CodePeople WP Time Slots Booking Form.This issue affects WP Time Slots Booking Form: from n/a through 1.2.11.

item.title: CVE-2024-2020|2024-06-04T17:29:54.143Z -- codepeople -- calculated%20fields%20form
item.description: The Calculated Fields Form plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the form page href parameter in all versions up to, and including, 5.1.56 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. Exploitation requires the professional version or higher.
